Name: Ms. Squeaker's Home for the Sick
About the game: A large militia force sent from the Beshkazstine terrorist organization has advanced into the city of Uthania. The State has deployed the Battery Forces which are expected to arrive in 3 days. The State soldiers currently positioned in Uthania are expected to hold them back until the reinforcements arrive. Civil war has arrived in Uthania. The 'Ms. Squeaker's Home for the Sick' children's hospital has been converted overnight by the government to accommodate the flood of wounded and dying civilians. You will maintain your job at the hospital, but will now be processing the patients of war. Do not let the State down, or risk termination from this position. Features Procederally generated patient documents Branching storyline with multiple unique endings Impactful gameplay choices, side with the State or the terrorists Animated and in-game cutscenes Steam achievements
